item.title: Donator Tab etc
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

yours…

if (c.isDonator == 0 && c.inWild()) { c.getPA().showInterface(19050); c.sendMessage("You opened the donator tab, thank-you for supporting Diversity!"); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be donator to open this, or be out of the wild!"); } break;

the first attempt to fix…

[quote=“I am beast, post:4, topic:413753”]This…

if (c.isDonator == 1 && c.inWild()) { c.getPA().showInterface(19050); c.sendMessage("You opened the donator tab, thank-you for supporting Diversity!"); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be donator to open this, or be out of the wild!"); } break;[/quote]

the right way…

if (c.isDonator == 1 && !c.inWild()) { c.getPA().showInterface(19050); c.sendMessage("You opened the donator tab, thank-you for supporting Diversity!"); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be donator to open this, or be out of the wild!"); } break;

see the problem? he put it to say if you are a donator and in wilderness, then you can open it. otherwise GFY! lol. im paraphrasing of course >.>

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Tab etc
item.dc:creator: @stooks stooks
item.description:
@stooks wrote:

I cannot view my donator tab; character-rights=3 isdonator=1

Here is part of my clickbuttons.java code that deals with donator properties.

if (c.isDonator == 0 && c.inWild()) { c.getPA().showInterface(19050); c.sendMessage("You opened the donator tab, thank-you for supporting Diversity!"); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be donator to open this, or be out of the wild!"); } break; case 74108: if (c.isDonator == 1 && c.inGWD()) { c.sendMessage("You must be a Donator and be in godwars dungeon to use this!"); } else { c.Arma = 15; c.Band = 15; c.Sara = 15; c.Zammy = 15; c.sendMessage("Your magical donator rank forces your KC to raise to 15!"); } break; case 74109: if (c.isDonator == 0) { c.sendMessage("You must be an donator to teleport to the donator-zone!"); } else { c.getPA().spellTeleport(2516, 3860, 0); c.sendMessage("You teleported to donator-zone a place to chill/relax, theres also alot of benefits."); return; } break; case 74113: if(c.isDonator == 0 || c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You must be outside wilderness and be a donator to use this!"); return; } if (c.playerMagicBook == 0 && c.isDonator == 1 && c.inWild()) { c.playerMagicBook = 1; c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); c.setSidebarInterface(0, 328); c.sendMessage("An ancient wisdomin fills your mind."); c.getPA().resetAutocast(); return; } if (c.playerMagicBook == 1 && c.isDonator == 1 && c.inWild()) { c.playerMagicBook = 2; c.setSidebarInterface(0, 328); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 29999); c.sendMessage("Your mind becomes stirred with thoughs of dreams."); c.getPA().resetAutocast(); return; } if (c.playerMagicBook == 2 && c.isDonator == 1 && c.inWild()) { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern c.playerMagicBook = 0; c.setSidebarInterface(0, 328); c.sendMessage("You feel a drain on your memory."); c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); return; } break; case 74112: if(c.isDonator == 0 || c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You must be out of wilderness and be a donator to use this!"); return; } if(c.specAmount < 5.0){ if (c.specRest > 0) return; c.specRest = 240; c.sendMessage("You May Only Restore Your Special Every 3 Minutes!"); c.specAmount = 5.0; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]); c.sendMessage("Your special attack has been restored."); } break; case 74114: //c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.diversity-rsps.webs.com", 12000); c.sendMessage("You must talk to Stooks!"); break; case 74115: if (c.isDonator == 1) { c.sendMessage("You must be a Donator To See This Feature!"); } else { c.getPA().startTeleport(2858, 3758, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("You teleport to Frost Dragons!"); } break; case 74116: if (c.isDonator == 1) { c.sendMessage("You must be a Donator To See This Feature!"); } else { c.getPA().showInterface(2808); c.sendMessage("Choose any skill you would like to gain 3M XP in!"); } break; case 74110: //if (c.isDonator == 1) { //c.sendMessage("You must be a Donator To See This Feature!"); //} else { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.runelocus.com/toplist/index.php?action=vote&id=26831", 12000); c.sendMessage("Thank you for taking your time and voting for us!"); //} break;
